text: @10DowningStreet This objective has total & utter support. No ifs, no buts. 5 point plan is exemplary. Can't judge it as I don't know its execution & implementation details. I trust you to deliver it. No ifs no buts. I hope I am here to see it succeed. #coronavirus #marr @bbc5live #SundayFunday
